posts.title: 真正意义上的第一稿
posts.text: #不知道这个能不能成功啊,其实只是一个测试嗯,该怎么说呢,最近目标还是找工作,学习,日语最近重新的反复看在学了但今天一天都在搞网站了,网站目前还需要学习,不断不断的建立暂且就这样吧,也不知道还能写些什么,以后看看能不能弄个html播放器(放点mad)

posts.title: 第二稿,测试视频用的
posts.text: 一个测试,试了下dplayer这个插件,不知道能不能成功啊 (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer0"),"autoplay":true,"theme":"#FADFA3","loop":true,"lang":"zh-cn//语言","screenshot":true,"hotkey":true,"preload":"auto","volume":0.9,"video":{"url":"/resources/video/まどろみ_v07.mp4","pic":"/resources/images/banner.png"},"danmaku":{"id":"9E2E3368B56CD123BB4","api":"https://api.prprpr.me/dplayer/","token":"tokendemo","maximum":1000,"addition":["['https://api.prprpr.me/dplayer/v3/bilibili?aid=4157142']"]}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})()
